The summer creativity keeps rolling in, and we’re loving your unique office setups!

Haven’t shared your summer office setup yet? Now’s the perfect time—there are 3 prizes up for grabs thanks to FACES! 

Here’s how to join in:
- Post a photo or video of your summer office on One Chalhoub tagging @ <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1747&user=10620> Nadiem Karas <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1747&user=10620> 
- Share it on your Instagram Stories and tag @ChalhoubGroup <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1748&user=10620>  
(TikTok reels and fun videos are more than welcome!)

Here’s how to join in:
- Post a photo or video of your summer office on One Chalhoub tagging @ <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1747&user=10620> Nadiem Karas <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1747&user=10620>

(TikTok reels and fun videos are more than welcome!)

Don’t forget to send your high-res photos/videos to Nadiem Karas <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1749&user=10620>  or Nina Samin <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1750&user=10620>  to be featured in our end-of-summer Instagram recap.

Let’s keep showcasing how flexible and fun remote work can be this season! 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Your Guide to Continuous Learning

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1751&user=10620> 	

Our updated Chalhoub University Learning Directory brings you the latest learning experiences from across our 5 Academies all in one place. Whether you're planning your next step, seeking inspiration, or simply curious about what’s new, the directory is your guide to continuous growth.

Explore new offerings, revisit your goals, and take ownership of your development journey because learning <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1751&user=10620>  doesn’t stop, and neither should you.

chunks.text:
Explore new offerings, revisit your goals, and take ownership of your development journey because learning <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1751&user=10620>  doesn’t stop, and neither should you.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-6-min.png> 	

Chalhoub Group at Jusoor Summer Camp | Lebanon

This summer, 10 Chalhoub Impact Leaders had the privilege of volunteering at the Jusoor Center in Lebanon, bringing joy, creativity, and hope to Syrian refugee children. 
Through art, play, and heartfelt connection, we witnessed the power of small moments to spark lasting change. 
The mural we painted together now stands as a symbol of resilience, pride, and shared humanity. This experience reminded us that even the simplest acts of kindness can leave a lifelong imprint. Read more. <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1752&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1752&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

Stay Safe During Summer Holidays

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1753&user=10620> 	

Planning your summer getaway? Stay safe while you explore with these essential travel tips—because peace of mind is the best travel companion. From protecting your valuables to staying cyber-aware, a little preparation goes a long way.

Planning your summer getaway? Stay safe while you explore with these essential travel tips—because peace of mind is the best travel companion. From protecting your valuables to staying cyber-aware, a little preparation goes a long way.

Tap into our full guide <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1753&user=10620>  for practical advice that helps you travel smarter and safer this summer.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-1-min.png> 	

Jil Sander Exclusive Sale

The sale continues, Chalhoub Group team members can enjoy an additional 20% off on already discounted selected lines at the Jil Sander boutique, Mall of the Emirates.

This offer is available exclusively during the Dubai Summer Sale valid until August 31st. Chalhoub Group ID or One Chalhoub profile will be required at the time of purchase.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/13288bc6ee1d765ced473bc40115ea471292412946.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-7-min.png> 	

Farm Rio Exclusive Sale

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1754&user=10620> 	

Shop our final markdowns now with new styles added and enjoy a flat 50% discount until August 3rd.

You can log in online <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1754&user=10620>  with your Chalhoub Group account and use code CHALHOUB50 at checkout to avail your discount. Or you can visit our Mall of the Emirates store and present your Chalhoub Group ID or One Chalhoub Profile.

Happy shopping!
